original: @214b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @214b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: ku ru kulle karma pra sa rapra yog / bod skad du /
analyzed: ku ru kulle karma pra sa rapra yog / bod skad du /
translated: Kurukulle karma prasara prakriyaüîΩIn Tibetan:

original: ku ru kulle'i las rab tu brkyang ba sbyor ba /üîΩ'phags ma ku ru kulle la phyag 'chal lo //
analyzed: ku ru kulle'i las rab tu brkyang ba sbyor ba / 'phags ma ku ru kulle la phyag 'chal lo //
translated: The Application of the Extensive Activity of KurukulleüîΩHomage to the Noble Kurukulle.

original: aom ku ru kulle sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom ku ru kulle sv'ah'a /
translated: Om kurukulle svaha.

original: 'phags ma sgrol ma'i snying po'o //
analyzed: 'phags ma sgrol ma'i snying po'o //
translated: This is the essence of the Noble Tara.

original: sa gsum nus pa gzhom med pa'i //
analyzed: sa gsum nus pa gzhom med pa'i //
translated: The invincible power of the three worlds

original: dbang gi las ni rab tu brkyang //
analyzed: dbang gi las ni rab tu brkyang //
translated: Is extended in the activity of subjugation.

original: sngon gsungs ting 'dzin la gnas nas //
analyzed: sngon gsungs ting 'dzin la gnas nas //
translated: Dwelling in the samadhi previously taught,

original: yi ge 'bum du bzlas pa bya //
analyzed: yi ge 'bum du bzlas pa bya //
translated: One should perform the recitation one hundred thousand times.üîΩThen, anointed with flowers and incense,

original: @215a * // phyi nas me tog bdug pas byug / dri dang phye ma gos la sogs //
analyzed: @215a * // phyi nas me tog bdug pas byug / dri dang phye ma gos la sogs //
translated: With unguents, powders, clothes, and so forth,

original: sngags 'dis mngon par bsngags gyur te //
analyzed: sngags 'dis mngon par bsngags gyur te //
translated: These are the mantras to be recited:

original: gang la byin de dbang du 'gyur //
analyzed: gang la byin de dbang du 'gyur //
translated: Whoever is given these will be subjugated.

original: dri bzang bdug pas bdag bdugs nas //
analyzed: dri bzang bdug pas bdag bdugs nas //
translated: Anointing oneself with fragrant incense,

original: skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur //
analyzed: skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur //
translated: One will be loved by all people.

original: gang ming me tog dmar po yi //
analyzed: gang ming me tog dmar po yi //
translated: Whoever's name is used with red flowers

original: sbyin sreg byas te dbang du 'gyur //
analyzed: sbyin sreg byas te dbang du 'gyur //
translated: In the burnt offering, they will be subjugated.

original: bza' btung la yang mngon par bsngags //
analyzed: bza' btung la yang mngon par bsngags //
translated: Also, one should recite over food and drink,

original: gang la byin de dbang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang la byin de dbang 'gyur ro //
translated: Whoever is given it will be under one‚Äôs control.

original: skyes bu chen po dbang byed na //
analyzed: skyes bu chen po dbang byed na //
translated: If one wants to enthrall a great man,

original: yungs kar dkar pos sbyin sreg bya //
analyzed: yungs kar dkar pos sbyin sreg bya //
translated: one should perform a homa with white mustard seeds.

original: phyi nas tshes grangs rgyu skar rnams //
analyzed: phyi nas tshes grangs rgyu skar rnams //
translated: Then, on an auspicious day and under a propitious lunar asterism,

original: bzang po'i nyin la bcom ldan ma //
analyzed: bzang po'i nyin la bcom ldan ma //
translated: one should worship the Blessed LadyüîΩand so forth,

original: mchod pa la sogs byas nas ni //üîΩgur gum gi wang ga pur sogs //
analyzed: mchod pa la sogs byas nas ni // gur gum gi wang ga pur sogs //
translated: and write the name of the targetüîΩon a piece of birch bark or cloth

original: grog 'am ni yang na gos //
analyzed: grog 'am ni yang na gos //
translated: with saffron, guggulu, camphor, and so forth.

original: 'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu drug pa //
analyzed: 'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu drug pa //
translated: One should draw a wheel with sixteen spokes

original: autpal 'dab ma'i rnam pa la //üîΩ'khor lo mngon par bri bya ste //
analyzed: autpal 'dab ma'i rnam pa la // 'khor lo mngon par bri bya ste //
translated: in the shape of an utpala petal.

original: 'khor lo'i dbus su sngags bcas la //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i dbus su sngags bcas la //
translated: In the center of the wheel, one should write the mantra

original: bsgrub bya yi ni ming rnams bri //
analyzed: bsgrub bya yi ni ming rnams bri //
translated: together with the name of the target.

original: 'khrul 'khor ku ru kulle yi //
analyzed: 'khrul 'khor ku ru kulle yi //
translated: This is the yantra of KurukullƒÅ,

original: yi ge bzhi yi 'khrul 'khor te //
analyzed: yi ge bzhi yi 'khrul 'khor te //
translated: consisting of four syllables,

original: bsgrub bya'i ming ni nges par bri //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i ming ni nges par bri //
translated: on which one should definitely write the name of the target.

original: phyi rol ao yi sum 'gyur bya //üîΩsrad bu dmar pos yang dag bri//
analyzed: phyi rol ao yi sum 'gyur bya // srad bu dmar pos yang dag bri//
translated: Outside, one should draw a triangleüîΩwith red thread.üîΩOne should wrap the target‚Äôs name

original: myos byed rang bzhin thum bu ni //
analyzed: myos byed rang bzhin thum bu ni //
translated: in a cloth soaked with liquorüîΩand place it in the center of the target‚Äôs heart.

original: lus kyi snying ga'i dbus su gzhug / seng ldeng me la bsro bar bya //
analyzed: lus kyi snying ga'i dbus su gzhug / seng ldeng me la bsro bar bya //
translated: One should heat it over a fire of cutch tree sticks.

original: rkang pa nas ni dgug par bya //
analyzed: rkang pa nas ni dgug par bya //
translated: One should summon [the victim] from the feet.

original: skyes pa'am ni yang na bud med dbang byed na //
analyzed: skyes pa'am ni yang na bud med dbang byed na //
translated: If one wants to enthrall a man or a woman,

original: zangs ma'i khab kyis skye gnas rkang pa dag dbug bya //
analyzed: zangs ma'i khab kyis skye gnas rkang pa dag dbug bya //
translated: one should pierce the genitals with a copper needle.

original: 'di nyid dbang du 'gyur bar the tshom med pa ste //
analyzed: 'di nyid dbang du 'gyur bar the tshom med pa ste //
translated: There is no doubt that he or she will be enthralled.

original: sngags kyi rgyal po 'di nyid dang pa chen po yis //
analyzed: sngags kyi rgyal po 'di nyid dang pa chen po yis //
translated: With great faith in this king of mantras,

original: bcom ldan 'das ma mchod par byas nas bzlas par bya //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma mchod par byas nas bzlas par bya //
translated: one should make offerings to the Blessed Lady and recite [the mantra].

original: rim pa 'di nyid kyis ni kun gyi dngos grub 'gyur //
analyzed: rim pa 'di nyid kyis ni kun gyi dngos grub 'gyur //
translated: By this very process, one will attain all accomplishments.

original: zhes pa ni ku ru kulle'i las rab tu brkyang ba sbyor ba rdzogs so//
analyzed: zhes pa ni ku ru kulle'i las rab tu brkyang ba sbyor ba rdzogs so//
translated: This concludes the expanded ritual practice of KurukullƒÅ.
